events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund as it does not fit properly.
The system has categorized this case under Refund based on the customer's mention of a refund request.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want a refund for your jacket. I’m here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is 4587321. The jacket is brand new; I just tried it on, and it’s too tight around the sleeves.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund once you return the jacket. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds perfect, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back right away.
We have received the returned jacket and initiated the refund to your original payment method. It should reflect in 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received the refund for your returned jacket and that everything is satisfactory.
Since your refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
